name: micro-frontend-container
description: Container que englobarÃ¡ todos os micro-frontends

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -p name --names "server,container,restaurants,order" "npm run start-server" "npm run start-container" "npm run start-restaurants" "npm run start-order"
scripts.standalone-restaurants: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -p name --names "server,restaurants" "npm run start-server" "cd ../restaurants && npm run standalone"
scripts.standalone-order: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -p name --names "server,order" "npm run start-server" "cd ../order && npm run standalone"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-container && npm run install-server, npm run install-restaurants && npm run install-order
scripts.install-fronts: npm run install-container && npm run install-restaurants && npm run install-order
scripts.remove-all: rimraf node_modules && cd ../restaurants && rimraf node_modules && cd ../orders && rimraf node_modules

author: Rene Souza
